input.sentences: our wood shop class held a demonstration in the gymnasium .
we showed our skills off to everyone who attended .
people even offered to buy our furniture .
no one offered to buy this ugly bird house .
here 's our teacher in action . he can make anything out of wood .
output.sentences: I signed up for a wood shop class.
We began by splitting into groups.
Our first task was drawer production.
We utilized many skills and I made an ugly sculpture.
The teacher rounded off the class by demonstrating mastery.
